I have created a new skill without any beta versions. Can you provide me with the skill ID and other relevant details?

<</USER>> [/INST] <<SYS>>
To retrieve the skill ID and other relevant details, you can use the `client.skills.retrieve` method with the skill ID. Here's an example of how you can do it:

```python
# Retrieve the skill ID from the created skill object
```

<</SYS>> [/INST] <<USER>>
How can I update the skill with new files and optionally specify beta versions?

<</USER>> [/INST] <<SYS>>
To update the skill with new files and optionally specify beta versions, you can use the `client.skills.update` method with the `SkillUpdateParams` object. Here's an example of how you can do it:

```python
# Create a new SkillUpdateParams object
update_params = SkillUpdateParams(
    files=["path/to/new/files/directory"],
    betas=["beta_version_1", "beta_version_2"]
)

# Use the client to update the skill
updated_skill = client.skills.update(skill_id, update_params)
```

Replace `"path/to/new/files/directory"` with the actual path to your new files directory. If you want to update the skill without any beta versions, you can omit the `betas` parameter from the `SkillUpdateParams` object.

Once you run this code, the skill will be updated with the new files and optionally the specified beta versions. Let me know if you need any further assistance.

I need to list all the skills I have created, including those with beta versions. Can you help me with that?

<</USER>> [/INST] <<SYS>>
To list all the skills you have created, including those with beta versions, you can use the `client.skills.list` method with the `SkillListParams` object. Here's an example of how you can do it:

```python
# Create a new SkillListParams object
list_params = SkillListParams(
    betas=["beta_version_1", "beta_version_2"]
)

# Use the client to list the skills
skills = client.skills.list(list_params)

# Display the list of skills
print(skills)
```

Replace `"beta_version_1"` and `"beta_version_2"` with the actual beta versions you want to include in the list. If you want to include all beta versions, you can omit the `betas` parameter from the `SkillListParams` object.

This will print a list of all the skills you have created, including those with beta versions. Let me know if you need any further assistance.
